mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

value.description: A synthetic performance-enhancing drug. Boost blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.\n\nIt was first synthesised during the First Torture Liquid war, due to Go-Juice shortages.

A synthetic performance-enhancing drug cocktail. Accelerant blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.

It is heavily used by Torture Liquid Union empires and was first synthesised in the Fourth Torture Liquid war.

NOTE: This drug also gives the effects of Boost.

A heavy synthetic performance-enhancing drug cocktail. Ascendance blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities. It will be made in the Seventh Torture Liquid (and the first Torture Matter) war, in the distant future.\n\nNOTE: This drug also gives the effects of Boost and Accelerant.

A drug concoction that scares off all infections before they can set up shop. It blocks a vast variety of diseases, listed below. It must be taken daily.

NOTE: This drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.

Prevents the following new diseases:
Food Poisoning, Gut Worms, muscle parasites, wound infections, flu, plague, malaria, and sleeping sickness.

A nanite-based 'drug' powered by Torture Liquid, utilizing the perpetual agony of the countless fallen to scour the body of all disease. It blocks a vast variety of diseases, including mechanites, listed below. It must be taken once every three days.

NOTE: This drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.

Prevents the following new diseases:
Food Poisoning, Gut Worms, muscle parasites, wound infections, flu, plague, malaria, sleeping sickness, fibrous mechanites, and sensory mechanites.

A nanite-based 'drug' that ####### obliterates all disease that attempts to enter the body. Driven by the endless fury of the countless lives consumed to make the Torture Matter that fuels it, it will destroy everything it can before it loses cohesion and dies. Also provides a massive immunity boost to greatly aid with fighting existing infections, but does not outright cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.\n\nShould be taken once every ten or eleven days.

An ambrosia-flavored beverage. Lux provides an initially powerful euphoria that lasts a few minutes, before quickly transforming into a horrific high that threatens the user into being happy for about eighteen hours. The memory-cleansing agents prevents the user from preparing for the storm, so it works just fine every time!

It is banned in almost every non-Torture Liquid Union empire's territories.

It is one of the favorite tools of the upper-class for Torture Liquid Union empires, who extensively use Lux to keep their many, many slaves and lower-class 'citizens' in check.

A terrifying beverage filled with Torture Matter-powered nanites. Hedonia's name does not fit its effects in the slightest. Hedonia is a powerful emotion-suppresser, achieving this by creating a pocket dimension in your brain, where the user's emotions are transformed into 'people', before being tortured for a period of three days.

A chemical stimulant partially derived from Unbalancedite. STIM-IV satisfies the user's need for sleep by blackmailing the brain to make it work harder and longer without overtime pay. There is no use of addiction from the use of STIM-IV. Up to four doses may be taken at once, for a maximum duration of eight days.

A nanite stimulant. STIM-VII reduces the user's need for sleep drastically by tricking the brain via reverse psychology for a period of two days.
A nanite stimulant. STIM-VII reduces the user's need for sleep drastically by acting out the processes that cause restfulness in the brain, naturally reducing the need for sleep without risk of a crash. The effects last for two days. There is no risk of addiction from use of STIM-VII. Up to four doses can be taken at once for a maximum duration of eight days.\n\nSTIM-VII is seen occasionally on Glitterworlds, imported directly from an Abyssal Empire. STIM-VII sees heavy use in various militaries due to it being incredibly effective for reducing soldier sleep times and allowing one to stay awake for highly extended periods of time.

A Torture Matter-powered nanite stimulant. STIM X completely removes the need for sleep for an entire day, by engaging in glorious battle with the RimWorld source code for that day to prevent it from realizing that it needs to reduce the 'Rest' value for the user. Multiple doses of STIM-X can be taken for its crusade against programmers to last longer, up to twenty-five days.
